name: The Pessimist - mu-59650
description:
One of ten in The Pessimist series. Generated by a hand-coded python application, this is the first objkt minted by @TheMaxBore. The Pessimist series is built on an instruction set that combines rectangles, ellipses, clipping paths, and fills to create geometric, conceptual, modern works that are structured in their composition, but organic in their rendition. All quantities, sizes, positions, and pallets are generated by the application. mu-59650 is a simple and clean composition with remarkable balance and surprising positioning and alignment. The art exists as an svg to preserve the integrity of the original and allow viewing and reproduction at any size.

Generative art created by MaxBore.
Official wallet: maxbore.tez
Official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/themaxbore
